2.27.21  8:31 am   that I might be wrong)
I'm gonna start from the most obvious part first

I don't have enough time    

To say the things I wanna say    
To do the things I wanna do    
Or to be like you     

---These 4 lines refer to how we are too busy to do the things we want, we aren't allowed to state our opinions freely, the line "or to be like you" may refer to how we compare ourselves to others
